Quest001.name: plant
Quest001.text: The spirit of nature and the crystaline engergy faultlines agree, I have some {0} to help you but I need {1} Serindipity, I tell you!

No001.name: plant
No001.text: Bless your heart,sweetheart. In our part of the cosmos, you have nothing we want.

Complete001.name: plant
Complete001.text: I am blessed to share our bounty with you. Here you go {0}
